name: Death Dog

extras.description: The dog makes two bite attacks.

On a hit, if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 1d10 on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

description: A **death dog** is an ugly two-headed hound that roams plains and deserts. Hate burns in a death dog's heart, and a taste for humanoid flesh drives it to attack travelers and explorers. Death dog saliva carries a foul disease that causes a victim's flesh to slowly rot off the bone.
